location.description: The location of the resource group to which the resource belongs.

kind.description: Indicates the type of database account. This can only be set at database account creation.

sqlContainers.description: Parameters to create and update Cosmos DB container.

mongoDBDatabases.description: Parameters to create and update Cosmos DB MongoDB database.

mongoDBCollections.description: Parameters to create and update Cosmos DB MongoDB collection.

properties.description: Properties to create and update Azure Cosmos DB MongoDB collection.

tables.description: Parameters to create and update Cosmos DB Table.

properties.description: Properties to create and update Azure Cosmos DB Table.

cassandraKeyspaces.description: Parameters to create and update Cosmos DB Cassandra keyspace.

properties.description: Properties to create and update Azure Cosmos DB Cassandra keyspace.

cassandraTables.description: Parameters to create and update Cosmos DB Cassandra table.

properties.description: Properties to create and update Azure Cosmos DB Cassandra table.

gremlinDatabases.description: Parameters to create and update Cosmos DB Gremlin database.

properties.description: Properties to create and update Azure Cosmos DB Gremlin database.

gremlinGraphs.description: Parameters to create and update Cosmos DB Gremlin graph.

properties.description: Properties to create and update Azure Cosmos DB Gremlin graph.

name.description: Name of the Cosmos DB capability. For example, "name": "EnableCassandra". Current values also include "EnableTable" and "EnableGremlin".

defaultConsistencyLevel.description: The default consistency level and configuration settings of the Cosmos DB account.

maxStalenessPrefix.description: When used with the Bounded Staleness consistency level, this value represents the number of stale requests tolerated. Accepted range for this value is 1 â€“ 2,147,483,647. Required when defaultConsistencyPolicy is set to 'BoundedStaleness'.

maxIntervalInSeconds.description: When used with the Bounded Staleness consistency level, this value represents the time amount of staleness (in seconds) tolerated. Accepted range for this value is 5 - 86400. Required when defaultConsistencyPolicy is set to 'BoundedStaleness'.

ConsistencyPolicy.description: The consistency policy for the Cosmos DB database account.

consistencyPolicy.description: The consistency policy for the Cosmos DB account.

locations.description: An array that contains the georeplication locations enabled for the Cosmos DB account.

ipRangeFilter.description: Cosmos DB Firewall Support: This value specifies the set of IP addresses or IP address ranges in CIDR form to be included as the allowed list of client IPs for a given database account. IP addresses/ranges must be comma separated and must not contain any spaces.

isVirtualNetworkFilterEnabled.description: Flag to indicate whether to enable/disable Virtual Network ACL rules.

enableAutomaticFailover.description: Enables automatic failover of the write region in the rare event that the region is unavailable due to an outage. Automatic failover will result in a new write region for the account and is chosen based on the failover priorities configured for the account.

capabilities.description: List of Cosmos DB capabilities for the account

virtualNetworkRules.description: List of Virtual Network ACL rules configured for the Cosmos DB account.

enableMultipleWriteLocations.description: Enables the account to write in multiple locations

DatabaseAccountCreateUpdateProperties.description: Properties to create and update Azure Cosmos DB database accounts.

failoverPriority.description: The failover priority of the region. A failover priority of 0 indicates a write region. The maximum value for a failover priority = (total number of regions - 1). Failover priority values must be unique for each of the regions in which the database account exists.

isZoneRedundant.description: Flag to indicate whether or not this region is an AvailabilityZone region

Location.description: A region in which the Azure Cosmos DB database account is deployed.

id.description: Resource ID of a subnet, for example: /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{groupName}/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/{virtualNetworkName}/subnets/{subnetName}.

ignoreMissingVNetServiceEndpoint.description: Create firewall rule before the virtual network has vnet service endpoint enabled

CreateUpdateOptions.description: CreateUpdateOptions are a list of key-value pairs that describe the resource. Supported keys are "If-Match", "If-None-Match", "Session-Token" and "Throughput"

SqlDatabaseCreateUpdateProperties.description: Properties to create and update Azure Cosmos DB SQL database.

resource.description: The standard JSON format of a SQL database

options.description: A key-value pair of options to be applied for the request. This corresponds to the headers sent with the request.

SqlDatabaseResource.description: Cosmos DB SQL database id object

id.description: Name of the Cosmos DB SQL database

SqlContainerCreateUpdateProperties.description: Properties to create and update Azure Cosmos DB container.

resource.description: The standard JSON format of a container

options.description: A key-value pair of options to be applied for the request. This corresponds to the headers sent with the request.

SqlContainerResource.description: Cosmos DB SQL container resource object

id.description: Name of the Cosmos DB SQL container

indexingPolicy.description: The configuration of the indexing policy. By default, the indexing is automatic for all document paths within the container

partitionKey.description: The configuration of the partition key to be used for partitioning data into multiple partitions

uniqueKeyPolicy.description: The unique key policy configuration for specifying uniqueness constraints on documents in the collection in the Azure Cosmos DB service.

conflictResolutionPolicy.description: The conflict resolution policy for the container.

automatic.description: Indicates if the indexing policy is automatic

includedPaths.description: List of paths to include in the indexing

excludedPaths.description: List of paths to exclude from indexing

path.description: The path for which the indexing behavior applies to. Index paths typically start with root and end with wildcard (/path/*)

IncludedPath.description: The paths that are included in indexing

path.description: The path for which the indexing behavior applies to. Index paths typically start with root and end with wildcard (/path/*)

indexes.description: List of indexes for this path

dataType.description: The datatype for which the indexing behavior is applied to.

precision.description: The precision of the index. -1 is maximum precision.

ContainerPartitionKey.description: The configuration of the partition key to be used for partitioning data into multiple partitions

paths.description: List of paths using which data within the container can be partitioned

kind.description: Indicates the kind of algorithm used for partitioning

Path.description: A path. These typically start with root (/path)

UniqueKeyPolicy.description: The unique key policy configuration for specifying uniqueness constraints on documents in the collection in the Azure Cosmos DB service.

uniqueKeys.description: List of unique keys on that enforces uniqueness constraint on documents in the collection in the Azure Cosmos DB service.

UniqueKey.description: The unique key on that enforces uniqueness constraint on documents in the collection in the Azure Cosmos DB service.

paths.description: List of paths must be unique for each document in the Azure Cosmos DB service

ConflictResolutionPolicy.description: The conflict resolution policy for the container.

conflictResolutionPath.description: The conflict resolution path in the case of LastWriterWins mode.

conflictResolutionProcedure.description: The procedure to resolve conflicts in the case of custom mode.

MongoDBDatabaseCreateUpdateProperties.description: Properties to create and update Azure Cosmos DB MongoDB database.

resource.description: The standard JSON format of a MongoDB database

options.description: A key-value pair of options to be applied for the request. This corresponds to the headers sent with the request.

MongoDBDatabaseResource.description: Cosmos DB MongoDB database id object

id.description: Name of the Cosmos DB MongoDB database

MongoDBCollectionCreateUpdateProperties.description: Properties to create and update Azure Cosmos DB MongoDB collection.

resource.description: The standard JSON format of a MongoDB collection

options.description: A key-value pair of options to be applied for the request. This corresponds to the headers sent with the request.

MongoDBCollectionResource.description: Cosmos DB MongoDB collection resource object

id.description: Name of the Cosmos DB MongoDB collection

shardKey.description: A key-value pair of shard keys to be applied for the request.

ShardKeys.description: The shard key and partition kind pair, only support "Hash" partition kind

MongoIndex.description: Cosmos DB MongoDB collection index key

key.description: Cosmos DB MongoDB collection index keys

options.description: Cosmos DB MongoDB collection index key options

MongoIndexKeys.description: Cosmos DB MongoDB collection resource object

keys.description: List of keys for each MongoDB collection in the Azure Cosmos DB service

MongoIndexOptions.description: Cosmos DB MongoDB collection index options

TableCreateUpdateProperties.description: Properties to create and update Azure Cosmos DB Table.

resource.description: The standard JSON format of a Table

options.description: A key-value pair of options to be applied for the request. This corresponds to the headers sent with the request.

id.description: Name of the Cosmos DB table

CassandraKeyspaceCreateUpdateProperties.description: Properties to create and update Azure Cosmos DB Cassandra keyspace.

resource.description: The standard JSON format of a Cassandra keyspace

options.description: A key-value pair of options to be applied for the request. This corresponds to the headers sent with the request.

CassandraKeyspaceResource.description: Cosmos DB Cassandra keyspace id object

id.description: Name of the Cosmos DB Cassandra keyspace

CassandraTableCreateUpdateProperties.description: Properties to create and update Azure Cosmos DB Cassandra table.

resource.description: The standard JSON format of a Cassandra table

options.description: A key-value pair of options to be applied for the request. This corresponds to the headers sent with the request.

CassandraTableResource.description: Cosmos DB Cassandra table id object

id.description: Name of the Cosmos DB Cassandra table

defaultTtl.description: Time to live of the Cosmos DB Cassandra table

schema.description: Schema of the Cosmos DB Cassandra table

name.description: Name of the Cosmos DB Cassandra table column

type.description: Type of the Cosmos DB Cassandra table column

CassandraPartitionKey.description: Cosmos DB Cassandra table partition key

name.description: Name of the Cosmos DB Cassandra table partition key

ClusterKey.description: Cosmos DB Cassandra table cluster key

name.description: Name of the Cosmos DB Cassandra table cluster key

orderBy.description: Order of the Cosmos DB Cassandra table cluster key, only support "Asc" and "Desc"

GremlinDatabaseCreateUpdateProperties.description: Properties to create and update Azure Cosmos DB Gremlin database.

resource.description: The standard JSON format of a Gremlin database

options.description: A key-value pair of options to be applied for the request. This corresponds to the headers sent with the request.

GremlinDatabaseResource.description: Cosmos DB Gremlin database id object

id.description: Name of the Cosmos DB Gremlin database

GremlinGraphCreateUpdateProperties.description: Properties to create and update Azure Cosmos DB Gremlin graph.

resource.description: The standard JSON format of a Gremlin graph

options.description: A key-value pair of options to be applied for the request. This corresponds to the headers sent with the request.

GremlinGraphResource.description: Cosmos DB Gremlin graph resource object

id.description: Name of the Cosmos DB Gremlin graph

indexingPolicy.description: The configuration of the indexing policy. By default, the indexing is automatic for all document paths within the graph

partitionKey.description: The configuration of the partition key to be used for partitioning data into multiple partitions

uniqueKeyPolicy.description: The unique key policy configuration for specifying uniqueness constraints on documents in the collection in the Azure Cosmos DB service.

conflictResolutionPolicy.description: The conflict resolution policy for the graph.
